                            The Thing (2011)                            
    At an Antarctica research site, the discovery of an alien craft     
    leads to a confrontation between graduate student Kate Lloyd and    
                     scientist Dr. Sander Halvorson.                    
                                                                        
                                                                  
                                                                      
                                                                  
                               6.6/10

               +-----------------------------------------+              
               |   Video Source: RUSSiAN (Thanks!)      |              
               |   Audio Source: MiSTERE (Thanks!)      |              
               |   Others Used : MiSTERE English Subs.  |              
               +-----------------------------------------+              
                                                                        
                         Encoder/Ripper: SMiLE                         
                                                                        
   Firstly we took the russian source and dropped it in for conversion  
   there we ran a few filters on it before then adding our mix of       
   custom encode settings. Turned out sweet. We then took the audio     
   from MiSTERE which is very sweet LiNE and converted + muxed it       
   to our video, we ran several sync checks and it's perfect. Only      
   problem we found was that it didn't have subs for the non-english    
   speaking parts; so we went out and grabbed some subtitles, we then   
   added them in a track along with our release. Now we must warn you   
   when we added them they totally glitched out, not sure if it's a     
   problem on our end, but just to be safe we included the subtitles    
   in with the release, so we suggest that you use those instead to be  
   on the safe side. Bit late on this one, but been very busy. Enjoy!   
                                                                        
                           +-------------------+
